name: The Woorley Cousins: Actions have consequences
name_original: The Woorley Cousins: Actions have consequences
description: This is part one of an episodic narrative game I have created. The story follows two cousins; Adam and Sarah Woorley through their experience in their families' drug empire. The player will play as both cousins at different points, making small and huge decisions throughout. These decisions change your experience.
